availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Lucinda Davenport. Father of Martha J. Davenport, Eliza A. Davenport, William C. Davenport, Nancy E. Davenport, Lucinda Davenport, John A. Davenport, And Ruthie F. Davenport. Farmer in Green County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Green County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 1, p. 89A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 2, p. 604.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, Precinct 3, p. 466B.
